title: BetrokkeneBijKlantContact to KlantContactMoment check
description: Makes sure there are not multiple variants of the same categorie.

mapping.#: {% if results|default %}{% set array = {results: results} %}{{ map('https://commongateway.nl/mapping/klant.betrokkeneBijKlantContactToKlantContactMomentResults.mapping.json', array, true)|json_encode }}{% elseif partij|default and klantcontact|default %}{% set array = {partij: partij, klantcontact: klantcontact} %}{{ map('https://commongateway.nl/mapping/klant.betrokkeneBijKlantContactToKlantContactMomentItem.mapping.json', array, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}
mapping.test: {% if partij|default and klantcontact|default %}{% set array = {partij: partij, klantcontact: klantcontact} %}{{ dump(array|keys) }}{% endif %}
